mapper.insert: INSERT INTO eventcontents(econtentsno, eventgrpno, etype, title, content, rdate) VALUES((SELECT NVL(MAX(econtentsno), 0) + 1 as econtentsno FROM eventcontents), #{eventgrpno},#{etype}, #{title}, #{content}, sysdate)
mapper.select: SELECT econtentsno, eventgrpno, etype, title, content, rdate FROM eventcontents ORDER BY econtentsno ASC
